name: 電腦與語言教學特論
description: This course will give you the essential knowledge about CALL (Computer Assisted Language Learning). CALL has become increasingly popular and many research papers are available, and we can only choose the most interesting and promising topics in the course. I would expect that you will be able to finish a small project and publish a paper in a conference proceedings or journal.
goals: Be familiar with the basic concepts of CALL
To explore the main issues involved in designing effective CALL systems
To understand what the current capabilities of CALL systems are, and the potential for making further improvements
